title: Definitions of child abuse
context: ยง588-2 Definitions of child abuse. For purposes of this chapter: &ldquo;Child sexual abuse&rdquo; means any of the offenses described under chapter 707, part V, when committed against a person under the age of eighteen years or as set forth in paragraph (2) of the definition of &ldquo;harm&rdquo; in section 587A-4. &ldquo;Serious physical child abuse&rdquo; means any of the offenses described in paragraph (1) of the definition of &ldquo;harm&rdquo; set forth in section 587A-4 when the offense rises to the degree of a felony as defined in section 701-107. [L 1986, c 169, pt of ยง1; am L 2001, c 219, ยง4; am L 2011, c 43, ยง19]
